title: Suggestion for Thunderbird icons
content: I use Thunderbird for email and Edge for my browser. Unfortunately the icons for the two are so similar it's difficult to tell them apart. I'd like to suggest that Thunderbird/Mozilla allow users to substitute their own icons for the running programs if they don't want to use the default one.

title: moving email to external folder
content: I want to export email from only one or two Thunderbird folders--either into a single Thunderbird folder which I place in Dropbox for someone else to download to their computer--or simply move all that email into one folder in Microsoft Office. I can move email into a external folder, but can only move a few at a time. I want to move all the email in one folder to folder outside of Thunderbird. Thank you!
creator: revoswin2

title: connecting to Outgoing server (SMTP) smtp.gmail.com failed
content:
Since more than a week I encounter problems in sending emails (receiving emails works fine). I always get following message: "connecting to Outgoing server (SMTP) smtp.gmail.com failed". So i finally uninstalled Thunderbird, and re-installed it this morning. But the issue remains. Windows 11 Thunderbird version 128.9.2esr (64 bit) outgoing server settings: server name: smtp.gmail.com, port 465, Authentication method: OAuth2, Connection security: SSL/TLS.

From what i gather, i dont seem to be the only one who is experiencing these problems recently. Please help?
creator: amerytom

title: Back up Local Folder data elsewhere
content:
I am backing up my Thunderbird (Windows 11) data weekly, and the size is rather large, as I have 19 years of messages (individual folders) in that Local Folder. Is there any way of saving these folders elsewhere so they are not backed up, or perhaps excluding them from backup somehow?

You are great with help, and just recently helped greatly!

Cheers, Jim.
creator: jim4001

title: hanging on "Host contacted, sending login information"
content:
hello,

I have been away from this laptop for about 7 months; now, when I try to access TBird, it seems to hang indefinitely [I haven't timed it but it seems like more than half an hour, maybe a lot more] displaying "xxxx@xxxxx.com: Host contacted, sending login information" in the bar at the bottom of the screen ... Every once in a long while, it jumps up and asks for my password. I give the one that relates to the "xxx" email address above and it rejects it as incorrect. I have checked that the password works to get into this account on webmail.

Can anyone help? I don't remember having this problem before. I am using TB 115.10.1 (64-bit) many thanks, filter feeder
creator: filterfeeder

title: NON RIUSCIAMO A INVIARE/RICEVERE EMAIL
content:
Buongiorno, siamo MACO2L SRL, un'azienda che ormai ds 2 settimane non riesce ad inviare email, o meglio il messaggio viene inviato ma salvato su una cartella locale invece che sul server. (allego foto) Le configurazioni sono tutte corrette come lo erano sempre state, nessuno di noi ha modificato alcun parametro. Abbiamo contattato anche il nostro hosting NETSONS ma ci hanno confermato che è tutto regolare e corretto.

Come dobbiamo fare?


I clienti ci dicono che non riescono nemmeno ad inviare email perchè il messaggio gli torna indietro.

Abbiamo fatto varie prove con nostri account gmail, ad inviare delle email, ma non le riceviamo.


Abbiamo 5 caselle di posta.

Servizio IMAP PORTA 993 SICUREZZA CONNESSIONE SSL/TLS


Grazie a chi ci aiuterà, saluti

title: My Message detected as spam [1747131339-578517] while repleying to existing thread
content:
Hello everybody, Lately I am getting this frustrating message, from time to time, while replying to an ongoing thread. Some times the issue is solved by removing images or links from the original recipient's signature (further down in the thread). Some other times though, I keep trying to find out what is the problem, deleting different parts of the previous emails on the thread, without any luck! Then I have to make my reply as a new separate message, which is just bad! This does not happen very often, and many times I happens only to one out of many of my replies in the same thread! Which really baffles me. Is this a bug?

Could somebody help me understand why this is happening? Is there a quick way to spot what and where exactly is the problem with my new email, so that I can remove or change the specific part and do my job?

Below you can see the error message I get: "Sending of the message failed. An error occurred while sending mail. The mail server responded: Message detected as spam. [1747131339-578517].. Please check the message and try again."

Thank you all in advance
creator: nikolaosyitsis

title: After marking all messages are read all folders show no messages
content:
After a major disk failure I had to import a profile from backup. So I now have my default (live) profile and the old (imported) profile. I moved the old messages into the default (live) profile. My live Inbox now has 8000 unread messages. After I mark these as Read no messages are displayed under any folder.

Using https://support.mozilla.org/bm/questions/1281467 to reset everything the I can see things again but as expected I still have 8000 unread messages.

Including other folders I have over 15K of Unread message after resert

Any ideas how to fix ?

Cheers

title: can't paste a quotation (sometimes)
content:
Why is it that sometimes I cannot use edit > paste as quotation. Sometimes I can then simply paste the text but sometimes not. I can't paste at all, that is. If I can't paste at all, but I paste into Notepad, then I can copy that plain text into TBird and it shows up. Different format but I don't really care about that.

This has been going on for years thru many TBird versions. And I cannot see any pattern in when pasting or pasting-as-quotation fails. It seems completely random.

Is there anything I can do to fix the problem? or better troubleshoot?

Thanks, Jeanne (Windows 11, TBird ver. 128.7.1esr (32-bit))
creator: JeanneR

title: No allow button to access gmail account on account set up
content:
Hi. I am trying to set up thunderbird on a new travel computer using gmail accounts. I enter the username and password and press done and it brings me to a screen saying thunderbird wants to access your google account, telling me to press allow. But there is no allow button to push (see screen info below). I have changed my accessibility settings to see the full screen but there is still nothing. I can't do this without an allow button. Help!

Mozilla Thunderbird Email wants to access your Google Account undefined joanneschneider77@gmail.com This will allow Mozilla Thunderbird Email to: More info Read, compose, send, and permanently delete all your email from Gmail Click for more information More info See, edit, download, and permanently delete your contacts Click for more information More info See, edit, share, and permanently delete all the calendars you can access using Google Calendar Click for more information By clicking Allow, you allow this app and Google to use your information in accordance with their respective privacy policies. You can change this and other Account Permissions at any time.
creator: joanneS2

title: The folder 'Inbox' could not be compacted because writing to folder failed. Verify that you have enough disk space, and that you have write privileges to the file system, then try again.
content:
Receiving this error a couple times a day when using Thunderbird: "The folder 'Inbox' could not be compacted because writing to folder failed. Verify that you have enough disk space, and that you have write privileges to the file system, then try again."

I can delete some emails but for the most part, everything in the Inbox cannot be deleted. I have looked at other forums but I haven't found a concrete set of steps to get this error fixed. I am not very familiar with the inner workings of Thunderbird, so more details on how exactly to get this fixed if possible would be appreciated.
creator: windmillthorns

title: Set up windows do not show entire screen and no way to go down
content: I am trying to set up both firefox and thunderbird on a new very small (12 inch screen) for travel and with a windows custom magnification of 110 for disabilities. The finish set up screen in firefox and the give thunderbird access to your google accounts screen in thunderbird do not appear to be showing the whole screen with no way to get to the bottom to click the critical allow or continue buttons. Those buttons appear to not exist. I am having the same problem trying to sign out of machines replaced several years ago - I can click which ones I want to sign out but it brings up a screen asking why with no continue button so I am stuck. Help!
creator: joanneS2

title: Problems with synchronizing Thunderbird calender with iCloud calender
content:
Dear ..,

For some time, I have my Thunderbird calender synchronised with my iCloud calender. The way I managed that before was this way: https://ekiwi-blog.de/en/65232/thunderbird-synchronize-with-icloud-calendar-and-contacts/

Today all of a sudden, one of the agenda's went 'missing'. I tried to get it back but without any luck. Therefore, I tried to setup the synchronisation completely new again (with new app-specific password). However, it won't work. I am getting the message that 'references used are not accepted'.

Can you help me solve this? Appreciate your help

Regards, Erica
